last_episode_to_air.name: The Mathurs leave for Paris
last_episode_to_air.overview: Watch Amaya Mathur making her debut in this show. Hers was one of the top 10 debuts of 2015. Ritika informs Amaya about her interview in Vogue magazine. Amaya tells her father, the millionaire Rishi, that she wants to do her higher studies in Paris. The Mathurs leave for Paris.

name: Tere Sheher Mein
overview: After the death of her father, Amaya Mathur's family faces financial problems and they move to Varanasi from Paris. There, Amaya meets Rafi and soon, the two fall in love.
